Package battle.logic

Class GameLogic

java.lang.Object
battle.logic.GameLogic
public class GameLogic extends Object
Manages the game logic for a battle between two trainers and their Pokemon.

  • Constructor Details

    • GameLogic

      public GameLogic(Trainer firstTrainer, Trainer secondTrainer, Battle battle, GameObserver observer, BattleObserver battleObserver)
      Constructs the game logic for a battle between two trainers.
      Parameters:
      firstTrainer - The first trainer participating in the battle.
      secondTrainer - The second trainer participating in the battle.
      battle - The Battle instance managing the battle mechanics.
      observer - The observer to notify game updates.
      battleObserver - The observer to notify battle end.

  • Method Details

    • setGameObserver

      public void setGameObserver(GameObserver observer)
      Sets the observer for game updates.
      Parameters:
      observer - The observer to set.

    • setBattleObserver

      public void setBattleObserver(BattleObserver battleObserver)
      Sets the observer for battle end.
      Parameters:
      battleObserver - The observer to set.

    • changePokemon

      public void changePokemon(int newPokemonIndex)
      Allows the current trainer to change their active Pokemon.
      Parameters:
      newPokemonIndex - The index of the new Pokemon in the trainer's team.

    • attack

      public void attack(int moveIndex)
      Executes an attack move from the current trainer's active Pokemon.
      Parameters:
      moveIndex - The index of the move to be used.
